干涸びる: (ひからびる) - to dry up completely; to become stale
干渉信号: (かんしょうしんごう) - interference signal
干渉電力: (かんしょうでんりょく) - interference power
干潟: (higata) - planície de maré, terra de maré
干潮: (ひしお) - low tide; low water; ebb
干潮線: (かんちょうせん) - low-water mark; low-tide line; ebb-tide line
干物: (からもの) - dried fish (or shellfish, etc.)
干物女: (ひものおんな) - woman who while young has abandoned love
干瓢: (かんぴょう) - strips of dried gourd
干菓子: (ひがし) - dried candies; dried confectionary; cookies
干菜: (ほしな) - dried leaves (esp. of daikon and turnip)
干菜湯: (ほしなゆ) - bath of dried leaves (esp. daikon and turnip)
干葉: (ひば) - dried leaves; dried daikon leaves
干飯: (ほしいい) - dried boiled rice used mainly as provisions of samurai troops and travelers (travellers)
干魃: (かんばつ) - drought; long spell (period) of dry weather
平: (ei/tchau/tai/hira) - flat , something broad and flat; common, ordinary, plain, rank-and-file
平々凡々: (へいへいぼんぼん) - (yoji) very ordinary; mediocre; all-too-common; quite commonplace
平す: (ならす) - to make even/to make smooth/to make level; to average
平たく言えば: (ひらたくいえば) - in plain words; in plain terms; put simply
平ちゃら: (へいちゃら) - coolness; calmness; composure; unconcern
平つくばる: (へいつくばる) - to make a deep bow
平べったい: (ひらべったい) - flat; even; level
平ら: (たいら) - flatness; level; smooth; calm; plain; sitting tailor fashion
平らげる: (たいらげる) - to subjugate; to put down (trouble); to consume (food); to eat up
平ゴム: (ひらゴム) - sewing elastic; flat bands of elastic for sewing in cuffs, etc.
平上去入: (ひょうじょうきょにゅう) - the four tones in old Chinese phonetics
平仄: (ひょうそく) - meter (in Chinese poetry); consistency
平仄を合わせる: (ひょうそくをあわせる) - to bring to same level; to harmonize
平仮名: (ひらがな) - hiragana; cursive Japanese syllabary used primarily for native Japanese words (esp. function words, inflections, etc.)
平仮名表記: (ひらがなひょうき) - written in hiragana
平伏す: (ひれふす) - to prostrate oneself before
平俗: (へいぞく) - commonplace/ordinary/trite; informal and easy to understand (of writing, etc.)
平党員: (ひらとういん) - rank-and-file party member
平入: (ひらいり) - Japanese traditional architectural structure, where the building has its main entrance on the side which runs parallel to the roof's ridge
平入り: (ひらいり) - Japanese traditional architectural structure, where the building has its main entrance on the side which runs parallel to the roof's ridge
平兵衛酢: (ヘベズ) - hebesu (var. of citrus fruit from Miyazaki); hebezu
平冠: (ひらかんむり) - kanji "wa" radical at top (radical 14)
平凡: (heibon) - ordinário, comum, banal, medíocre, sem destaque, pouco notável, sem eventos
平凡陳腐: (へいぼんちんぷ) - (yoji) commonplace and stale; humdrum and hackneyed
平句: (ひらく) - ordinary verse of a renga (i.e. not the first three verses or the last verse)
平和を保つ: (へいわをたもつ) - to maintain (preserve) peace
平和ボケ: (へいわボケ) - peace at any price (attitude); peace idiot/peace senility/complacency about peace
平和主義憲法: (へいわしゅぎけんぽう) - pacifist constitution
平和共存: (へいわきょうぞん) - peaceful coexistence
平和協力: (へいわきょうりょく) - peace collaboration
平和協定: (へいわきょうてい) - peace agreement
平和呆け: (へいわぼけ) - peace at any price (attitude); peace idiot/peace senility/complacency about peace
平和思想: (へいわしそう) - pacifism; pacifist thought
平和憲法: (へいわけんぽう) - pacifist constitution (often applied to the Japanese constitution); constitution which outlaws use of arms
